# Rust with Rohan

> A technical blog by Rohan covering Rust programming, systems programming, and software engineering concepts.

## About

This is a personal technical blog focused on Rust programming language concepts, memory management, systems programming, and software engineering best practices. Articles are written with clear explanations and practical code examples.

## Author

- Name: Rohan
- GitHub: https://github.com/Rohanarora17
- Twitter/X: https://x.com/Okayrohannn

## Content

Articles are published as MDX files with the following metadata:
- title: Article title
- abstract: Brief description
- publishedOn: Publication date (ISO 8601)
- tags: Topic tags (e.g., rust, memory-management)
- category: Content category

## Available Content

### Understanding Smart Pointers in Rust
- URL: /smart-pointers-in-rust
- Topics: Smart Pointers, Interior Mutability, Box, Rc, Arc, RefCell, Mutex, RwLock, Cow, Cell
- Category: Rust

## Navigation

- Homepage: / (lists all articles)
- RSS Feed: /rss.xml
- Sitemap: /sitemap.xml

## Technical Details

- Built with Next.js (React)
- Content authored in MDX format
- Syntax highlighting for code blocks
- Light/dark theme support
